title: PermissionEx 的問題
author: antony819
txt_content:
设置好地图後设置了BLOCKHUNT的游戏范围,但到最後设置了告示版*後想转回普通权限後却按告示版没反应,
权限是这样的
groups:
  default:
    options:
      default: true
    permissions:
    - modifyworld.*
    - gadgetsmenu.mysteryboxes.open.*
    - gadgetsmenu.menuselector
    - gadgetsmenu.commands.namepet
    - gadgetsmenu.autoequip.purchase
    - gadgetsmenu.autoequip.foundloot
    - gadgetsmenu.mysteryboxes.open.*
    - blockhunt.player
    - blockhunt.joinsign

schema-version: 1
users:
  ad2f2381-5484-4c05-bc94-b04e47ea095e:
    permissions:
    - gadgetsmenu.pets.zombievillager
    options:
      name: antony819


*[blockhunt]
     ruins
   0/16
waiting.....

replies.author: jmjmggg
replies.txt_content:
需要这个权限
essentials.build                       建筑权限
essentials.build.interact.*        交互权限
essentials.build.use.*              使用权限
